ygData.subject: Paw Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone mentioned on here a while back about going to Paw and giving the Paladin in the cell the note (or prayer beads?) from the Blessed Oil flask.  I am 18th
ygData.messageBody:
Someone mentioned on here a while back about going to Paw and giving
the Paladin in the cell the note (or prayer beads?) from the Blessed
Oil flask. I am 18th level, and while I can afford all of my 19th
level spells, if I can get a lot of them for free, it will certainly
be worth it. Can anyone give me approximate directions on how to get
to the Paladin in the cell?
I'm thinking I can bind myself at the Bridge, and deliver the thing
to the Pally, gate back, use the WK shortcut to get back to Qeynos
get another one, and then gate back, and avoid crossing WK altogether,
and do this several times. It should be an amazing time saver, and I
can get a lot of the spells I need.

Thanks.
